TopicTitle: Researchers capture the first ever snapshot of light behaving as both a wave and a particle.

Both? At the same time? WOW! That's AWESOME!

> 
> Both? At the same time? WOW! That's AWESOME!

Except one problem, the 3-D graph has no meaning

the x, y and z axii are not labeled and the meaning of the coloration is not described

So what exactly does the graph mean?

[http://actu.epfl.ch/news/the-first-ever-photograph-of-light-as-both-a-parti/](http://actu.epfl.ch/news/the-first-ever-photograph-of-light-as-both-a-parti/)
